level.text: 5607.1 The District will, no later than December 31 of each year, makenformation available to the public regarding:
Percent of overall regulatory compliance within the District, and numbersf underground storage tanks, facilities, and inspections; and
Confirmed releases from underground storage tanks within the District, andources and causes of releases.

5607.2 The public record will be posted or downloadable from the Districtepartment of the Environment’s website. Provisions will be made availableor those who request information, but do not have electronic access.
